name: Charade.s Dirty Party Game.s
description:
Charades! King of Booze is a drinking game for social gatherings, ideal for game night or if you are having a house party with your friends.

There are over 35 very diverse categories that range from innocent stuff such as movies, songs, TV shows, celebrities, to some of more adult themed categories.


Features:
- 3 game modes
- 35+ categories
- 5000+ cards


Game modes:

You Guess
Play heads up with your friends, draw cards using Tilt Controls

Others Guess

Set up a time record that your opponents have to beat, On-screen controls

The Fishbowl Game

Do little bit of everything and guess the same words for three rounds.

Round 1 – Taboo
Round 2 – Charades
Round 3 – Password

Keep in mind that few categories in this game were made for ADULTS, if you are too easily offended don't play those categories.

Hope you have a blast.

Please drink responsibly.
